programme.title: The Kite Runner, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Amir is a young Afghani from a well-to-do Kabul family; his best friend Hassan is the son of a family servant. Together the two boys form a bond of friendship that breaks tragically on one fateful day.

programme.title: The King's Speech, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Oscars® including "Best Picture" and "Best Actor," The King's Speech is based on the true story of King George VI's quest to find his voice. Starring Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, and Helena Bonham Carter.

programme.title: Texas Rangers, (2001, Western)
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Texas is at the mercy of murderous bandits. A group of unlikely heroes emerges to battle these renegade outlaws. Out-manned, they summon the courage to protect the innocent put the wrong things right in their beloved homeland.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a group of cannibal savages kidnaps settlers from the small town of Bright Hope, an unlikely team of gunslingers, led by Sheriff Hunt (Kurt Russell), sets out to bring them home.

programme.title: The Burrowers, (2009, Western)
programme.desc: In the 1870s Dakota Territories a family of settlers suddenly go missing, seemingly at the hands of hostile natives. However, when a group of explorers set out to find them it soon becomes apparent that something much more sinister is to blame.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: The Phantom, (1996, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: The story begins as an expedition lands on the island of Bengalla, seeking the skulls of Touganda. Believed to harness an energy force of power, they could spell disaster for mankind.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Turtles are back to battle a bigger threat alongside April O'Neil and vigilante Casey Jones. As they prepare to take on supervillain Shredder and his henchmen, Bebop and Rocksteady, they find themselves facing an even greater evil: the sinister Krang.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Young Charlie Kincaid, who discovers a secret headquarters under his home that seems to belong to a superhero. He shares it with his friends, and they start to believe that his estranged father might have a secret double life.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Turtles are back to battle a bigger threat alongside April O'Neil and vigilante Casey Jones. As they prepare to take on supervillain Shredder and his henchmen, Bebop and Rocksteady, they find themselves facing an even greater evil: the sinister Krang.

programme.title: School Daze, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Innovative filmmaker, Spike Lee (She's Gotta Have It), brings to the screen a music-filled, offbeat contemporary comedy that takes an unforgettable look at black college life. Rating: R

programme.title: Best In Show, (2000, Mockumentaries)
programme.desc: From the creators of Waiting for Guffman comes a hilarious mock documentary exposing the wondrously diverse dog owners who travel from all over the United States to showcase their four-legged contenders at the prestigious Mayflower Dog Show.

programme.title: Waiting for Guffman, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Would-be Broadway director Corky St. Clair writes, directs, choreographs and costumes a local show celebrating Blaine, Missouri's 150th anniversary in this hilarious comic spoof.

programme.title: A Mighty Wind, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When folk icon Irving Steinbloom passed away, he left a family of performers he had shepherded to folk stardom. For one night only in New York City's Town Hall, three groups will reunite to celebrate the music that almost made them famous.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hank (Paul Dano) is stranded on a deserted island and given up all hope. Everything changes when a corpse (Daniel Radcliffe) washes ashore. They become fast friends and go on an epic adventure to bring Hank back to the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Blades of Glory, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two figure skating rivals are banned from the sport after a brawl over the gold medal. Joining forces, they find a loophole in the rules that allows them to skate again... as a pair!

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe® winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: Uptown Girls, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Molly Gunn is the daughter of a late rock legend, and the toast of New York City. But when her inheritance is stolen, Molly is forced to do something she's never done before - get a job. Molly becomes a nanny to a girl, who is "eight going on forty."

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Party Girl, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: In this raucous comedy, Parker Posey ("Scream 3") stars as a hard-partying NY club girl who takes a job as a librarian.

programme.title: Spaceballs, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: Space hero Lone Starr (Bill Pullman) and his half-canine buddy Barf (John Candy) are on a mission in their flying Winnebago to save Princess Vespa (Daphne Zuniga) from the clutches of Dark Helmet (Rick Moranis) in Mel Brooks' inspired sci-fi spoof!

programme.title: Teen Witch, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: One week before her sixteenth birthday, a girl realizes that she is the descendant from one of the witches of Salem. She uses her newfound powers to snag herself the football-hero as her boyfriend and to become the most popular girl in school.

programme.title: Valley Girl, (1983, Romance)
programme.desc: When Valley Girl Julie (Deborah Foreman) dumps her preppy boyfriend, she unexpectedly finds love with rocker Randy (Nicolas Cage)...much to the dismay of her valley girlfriends who find Julie's punk hunk to be "grody to the max!" Fer Shure.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Screwball)
programme.desc: Our non-heinous heroes Bill (Alex Winter) and Ted (Keanu Reeves) are in danger of flunking history! But when the righteous Rufus (George Carlin) arrives in a time-travelling phone booth, the dense dudes discover their destiny!

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey, (1991, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this sequel to BILL & TED'S EXCELLENT ADVENTURE, the dimwitted duo travel to Heaven, Hell and points in between as they meet (among others) Albert Einstein, the Easter Bunny and the Grim Reaper.

programme.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: Yet to fulfill their rock and roll destiny, the stakes are higher than ever for the now middle-aged Bill and Ted who set out on a new adventure when a visitor from the future warns them that only their song can save life as we know it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (1985, Zombies)
programme.desc: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: We Summon the Darkness, (2020, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: A post-concert party at a remote country mansion turns into a grisly satanic slaughter scene in this dark-humored horror-thriller starring Alexandra Daddario and Johnny Knoxville.

programme.title: Hell Fest, (2018, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A serial killer in costume at a Halloween theme park kills off visitors, unbeknownst to bystanders who think it's part of the fun.

programme.title: Mandy, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: When a cult attacks, the shocking assault leads to vengeance.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps, (2001, Werewolves)

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the terrifying novel by Stephen King... After the Creed family moves to rural Maine, they stumble upon an ancient burial ground with sinister powers. When tragedy strikes, a perilous chain of events unleashes an unfathomable evil.

programme.title: Ghoulies, (1985, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II, (1988, Screwball)
programme.desc: Just as the eccentric Australian is starting to adjust to life in New York City, Dundee and his beautiful girlfriend (Linda Kozlowski) are targeted for death by a gang of ruthless drug dealers.

programme.title: About Last Night, (1986, Romance)
programme.desc: Rob Lowe doesn't want to get serious. Demi Moore doesn't want to get used. Together, they're an unforgettable couple in the sexy, contemporary comedy, ABOUT LAST NIGHT. Rating: R

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire, (1985, Romance)

programme.desc: A West Texas farm boy goes to the big city where he rides a mechanical bull, meets his future wife, and encounters the antagonism of an ex-con

programme.title: About Last Night, (1986, Romance)

programme.title: Top Secret!, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: Top Secret! pits American rock star Nick Rivers against the dreaded East German High Command. It's a race against time as Nick teams up with Hillary Flammond to find her father.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A thrilling misadventure involving three ingenious orphans and a villainous actor named Count Olaf (Jim Carrey) who wants their enormous fortune.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary, beloved anvil-armed sailor of the seven seas comes magically to life in this delightful musical, starring Robin Williams as Popeye, who meets all challenges with the unshakable philosophy, "I yam what I yam and that's all that I yam."

programme.title: Top Secret!, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: Top Secret! pits American rock star Nick Rivers against the dreaded East German High Command. It's a race against time as Nick teams up with Hillary Flammond to find her father.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they’ll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy’s addicted to tattling, and Jan’s hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.title: Zoolander, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: Three-time male model of the year, Derek Zoolander, is devastated when he loses the title to newbie Hansel. After the news, Mugatu's fashion empire brainwashes Derek into being an assassin.

programme.title: Zoolander 2, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: When the world's most beautiful people are in danger, former models Derek and Hansel are recruited for a top secret mission to defeat the criminal mastermind Mugatu. Prepare for a dangerously sexy adventure where looks really can kill.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: Devil in a Blue Dress, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington turns up the heat as a L.A. private eye in this steamy mystery from executive producers Jonathan Demme and Edward Saxon and director Carl Franklin. Washington stars as Ezekiel "Easy" Rawlins. Rated: R

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: American Heist, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: James (Hayden Christensen) and his older brother Frankie (Adrien Brody) turn to underworld connections in hopes that one last heist will be the answer to change both of their lives.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: Green Room, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After witnessing a shocking crime, a young rock band is unexpectedly thrust into a life-or-death battle to escape the clutches of a diabolical club owner (Patrick Stewart) and his ruthless henchmen in this white-knuckle thriller.

programme.title: Happily, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: A happily married couple (Joel McHale and Kerry Bishé) discover their friends are resentful of their lustful relationship. When a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, they begin to question the loyalty of their so-called friends.

programme.desc: Get ready for the most outrageous coming-of-age love story about growing up...and blowing up! When students in their school begin exploding (literally...), seniors Mara and Dylan struggle to survive in a world where each moment may be their last.

programme.title: Blue Valentine, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: Oscar®-nominees Ryan Gosling (THE NOTEBOOK) and Michelle Williams (BROKEBACK MOUNTAIN) star in BLUE VALENTINE, a story of love found and love lost told in moments past and present.

programme.title: In The Mood For Love, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Happily, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: A happily married couple (Joel McHale and Kerry Bishé) discover their friends are resentful of their lustful relationship. When a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, they begin to question the loyalty of their so-called friends.

programme.desc: Oscar®-nominees Ryan Gosling (THE NOTEBOOK) and Michelle Williams (BROKEBACK MOUNTAIN) star in BLUE VALENTINE, a story of love found and love lost told in moments past and present.

programme.title: Remember Me, (2010, Romance)

programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.desc: Dr. Lawrence Angelo (Pierce Brosnan) is a brilliant scientist obsessed with perfecting virtual reality software. When his experiments on animals fail, he finds the ideal substitute – Jobe Smith (Jeff Fahey), a slow-witted gardener.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Redford stars as Jay Gatsby, who had once loved beautiful, spoiled Daisy Buchanan (Mia Farrow), then lost her to a rich boy. But now Gatsby is mysteriously wealthy...and ready to risk everything to woo Daisy back.

programme.title: Starting Over, (1979, Romance)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds plays Phil Potter, a low-key, contented magazine writer who tries to put his life back together after his wife Jessica (Candice Bergen) opts for independence as a singer-songwriter.

programme.title: Great Expectations, (1974, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Charles Dickens' classic tale of Pip, a poor orphan who befriends an escaped convict and who grows up in the company of a bitter old woman, Miss Havisham, and her haughty young ward, Estella.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Heaven Can Wait is a romantic fantasy about Joe Pendleton, a Los Angeles Rams quarterback who is accidentally summoned to Heaven by an overly zealous celestial escort.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / A GOLD LION'S AMBITION ON THE MOVE

programme.title: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / LITTLE EAST BLUE IN DANGER

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / THE FIERCE ONSLAUGHT OF THE AMIGO PIRATES

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A PARADISE IN HELL / IMPEL DOWN LEVEL 5.5

programme.title: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TREATMENT BEGINS / IVA'S MIRACULOUS POWER!

programme.title: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BELIEVE IN MIRACLES! BON CLAY'S CRIES FROM THE HEART

programme.title: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission – until he learns of Luffy's lineage!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BACK IN ACTION! IVA BEGINS THE BREAKOUT PLAN!!

programme.title: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ACE'S CONVOY BEGINS / BATTLE ON THE LOWEST FLOOR, LEVEL 6!

programme.title: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ULTIMATE TEAM IS FORMED / SHAKING IMPEL DOWN!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN MORE CHAOS! BLACKBEARD TEACH INVADES

programme.title: Ivan undergoes a curvaceous transformation to better battle sadistic Sadie, the commander of the Demon Guards. Meanwhile, Blackbeard and Shiryu head for a showdown on Level 1!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DANGEROUS ENCOUNTER! BLACKBEARD AND SHIRYU OF THE RAIN!

programme.title: Luffy's bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say – heads will roll!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REFUSAL TO BE DEFEATED! SERIOUS HANNYABAL

programme.title: Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard's vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: JET PISTOL OF ANGER! LUFFY VS. BLACKBEARD!

programme.title: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan's toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy's neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden's Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STOP MAGELLAN! IVA'S ESOTERIC TECHNIQUE EXPLODES!

programme.title: Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAGELLAN'S TRICKY MOVE! A FOILED ESCAPE PLAN!

programme.title: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don't return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won't survive long enough to save Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ESCAPEE TEAM IN TROUBLE! THE FORBIDDEN MOVE: VENOM DEMON!

programme.title: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they're not out of hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COME, FINAL MIRACLE! BREAK THROUGH THE GATE OF JUSTICE!

programme.title: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy's reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE NAVY HEADQUARTERS! OFF TO RESCUE ACE!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE WEATHERIA REPORT AND THE CYBORG ANIMALS!

programme.title: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE CHICK OF A GIANT BIRD AND A PINK SHOWDOWN!

programme.title: Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! REVOLUTIONARIES AND THE GORGING FOREST'S TRAP!

programme.title: Zoro's attempt to reunite with his friends leads him to a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A HUGE TOMB AND THE PANTY DEBT!

programme.title: While the marines prepare for Ace's execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL RETROSPECTIVE BEFORE MARINEFORD! THE VOW OF THE BROTHERHOOD!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang continue on their way to Marineford, but once he arrives, the rubber-man must defeat both Navy Admirals and Warlords of the Sea before he can save Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL RETROSPECTIVE BEFORE MARINEFORD! THE THREE NAVY ADMIRALS COME TOGETHER!

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Looper, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this futuristic action thriller, time travel will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a 'looper,' a hired gun, is waiting to mop up.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land barron and his hired gun.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: McLintock!, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintock’s ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen O’Hara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Last Of The Pony Riders, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tries to set up a stage line to carry government mail. Schemers try to get the government assignment for their own stage line, and plan to discredit the Pony Express by causing accidents.

programme.title: On Top Of Old Smoky, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry, who is mistaken for a Texas Ranger, helps the owner of a toll road, while she is being pressured by bad characters to relinquish her property, which contains valuable mica deposits.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: Wagons East!, (1994, Western)
programme.desc: They came for gold, but now they'll settle for indoor plumbing. John Candy and Richard Lewis star in this hilariously unconventional look at the legendary West.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: The Island, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a "harvested being", and is being kept along with others in a utopian facility.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Vantage Point, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: During an historic counter-terrorism summit in Spain, the President of the United States is struck down by an assassin's bullet. Eight strangers have a perfect view of the kill, but what did they really see? Rated: PG-13

Em uma noite estrelada, Jack e Jill conhecem, separadamente, uma cigana que lhes diz que conhecerão o amor de suas vidas antes da meia-noite do final do ano, A contagem regressiva começa, e uma série de encontros horríveis e hilários. programme.title: Não O Tipo Da Cinderela, (2018)

programme.title: Atração Irresistível, (1998)
programme.desc: 1998. Quando ainda era criança, Danny ajudou Anna Swann, a filha da vizinha, a nascer. Apesar de vários relacionamentos, ele sempre achou que seu destino era se casar com ela. Anos depois, ele volta para sua cidade natal determinado a realizar seu sonho. programme.desc: 2020. programme.title: Terremoto, (2014)
programme.desc: 2014. Quando uma série de terremotos começa a destruir Los Angeles, Emily e Jason correm pelas ruínas da cidade na esperança de desviar o epicentro para salvar milhões de vidas. Quando uma série de ataques de tubarões provocou o pânico na cidade, ela e um perito em tubarões decidiram investigar os estranhos incidentes. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Dolph Lundgren, Danny Roth, Sara Lane Diretor: Jerry Dugan

programme.title: Megalodon, (2018)

Gêneros: Horror Elenco: Michael Madsen, Dominic Pace, Caroline Harris, Scott Roe Diretor: James Thomas

programme.desc: 1970. Um ex-agente das forças especiais da China leva uma vida pacata no litoral da África. Mas sua tranquilidade é abalada quando mercenários começam a atacar a população. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: A Recruta Hollywood, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Mega Valentine é uma estrela de cinema à beira da falência. Quando vê a chance de estrelar em um filme baseado no serviço militar, decide alistar-se no Exército para convencer o produtor da obra de que ela é a atriz ideal para o papel principal. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão, (1970)

Um dia, seu pai decide vender o felino para caçadores de troféus e ela não vê outra opção além de fugir com Charlie para salvá-lo. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.desc: 1970. Depois da morte de seu mentor, assassina passa a trabalhar como agente do governo com a promessa de ficar livre após dez anos. No entanto, ela descobre vários segredos do passado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Último Dragão, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma força malévola toma conta dos reinos de Agonos, e um cavaleiro solitário embarca em uma perigosa busca para encontrar o último dragão e salvar o mundo deste grande e crescente mal. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Assassinos Anônimos, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A tensão está insuportável dentro da Assassinos Anônimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos estão tentando descobrir qual deles está por trás de um atentado contra um importante senador. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: As Origens do Universo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O mundo que nos rodeia contém muitos sistemas complexos que funcionam perfeitamente juntos. Durante muitos anos, houve um debate acalorado entre evolução e criação, com a questão central de tudo: a Terra foi criada ou surgiu por conta própria. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Gata Selvagem, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um novo conflito provoca uma rixa entre Luis Mario e Rosaura. Ela queria vingança, mas tudo dá muito errado; Karina manipula Doña Cruz e a coloca contra Cláudia. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Gata Selvagem, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Eva leva Luis Mário à praia, sabendo que Bruno trabalha lá; Camélia e Patrício perdem muito dinheiro no cassino. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Gata Selvagem, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Claudia planeja contratar um detetive para Karina. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Gata Selvagem, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Bruno é motivo de discórdia entre Luis Mario e Rosaura, e ela fica arrasada; Eduarda é descoberta ao conversar com Panchita, a empregada; María Julia tenta conquistar a confiança de Claudia. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Gata Selvagem, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Luis Mario tem certeza de que Rosaura não é a mulher da sua vida. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Gata Selvagem, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Eduarda quebra a promessa do irmão; ele tem um plano contra Rosaura; Jimena fica bêbada. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Um Porto Seguro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mulher misteriosa se muda para uma pequena cidade e recomeça sua vida. Apesar da moça estar determinada a não formar laços afetivos na nova cidade, ela não consegue cumprir esse objetivo e acaba levantando questionamentos sobre seu passado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Chester e Colette decidem fazer uma viagem de barco à Grécia. No local, eles conhecem Rydal, um guia americano que fala grego e decide ajudá-los. O que eles não sabem é que Rydal é conhecido por aplicar golpes nos turistas. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Inimaginável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Em um futuro apocalíptico, a Suécia enfrenta um misterioso ataque, e Alex se vê obrigado a voltar para sua terra natal. Ali, ele deve lidar com seu pai e também reencontrar seu amor de juventude, Anna. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: E.A.S. - Esquadrão Antissequestro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um grupo de terroristas sequestra a filha de um jogador de futebol e planeja explodir o Maracanã em plena Copa do Mundo. Rafael, ex-integrante do Esquadrão Antissequestro, tem a missão de salvar a menina e impedir o desastre. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Vale dos Deuses, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A abundância contrasta com a pobreza em três narrativas separadas, apresentando um escritor de classe média, um trilionário excêntrico e uma comunidade Navajo em dificuldades. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Condução Perigosa, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Simon Keller, um misterioso ladrão, planeja roubar um banco e obriga um antigo piloto de corrida a dirigir o carro de fuga. Após o roubo, eles enfrentam policiais e mafiosos em uma alucinante perseguição na costa da Austrália. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Apenas Amigos, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Ao visitar sua cidade natal durante o Natal, um executivo fica cara a cara com sua antiga paixão do ensino médio, de quem era o melhor amigo - uma mulher cuja rejeição a ele o transformou em um mulherengo feroz. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Uma Nova Paixão, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Presa em um casamento e uma vida vazia, mulher se entrega a um intenso romance com um músico misterioso recém-chegado à uma pequena cidade australiana. Seu marido ameaça separá-los, levando o triângulo amoroso a uma jornada de amor e redenção. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Evidências de um Crime, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O policial Tom Cutler abandonou a profissão depois da morte da mulher para se concentra em criar a filha Rose. Ele sobrevive limpando cenas de crime, mas um trabalho rotineiro acaba ameaçando a vida estável que construiu para si próprio e a filha. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Árvore da Vida, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. História de uma típica família americana dos anos 50, formada por um casal e três filhos. A rígida educação, o ambiente e o passado ainda permeiam a vida de Jack, o filho mais velho, que na vida adulta tenta se reconciliar com o pai. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Bela e a Fera, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Pessoas de um vilarejo estão sendo brutalmente assassinadas e a Fera é acusada de ser a responsável pelas mortes. Acreditando em sua inocência, Bela e Fera se juntam para descobrir e combater o responsável pelos crimes. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Angélica é uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de câncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Conheça a história do órfão Wim, um menino que quer muito ir à escola em vez de passar o tempo todo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com muita força de vontade, Wim consegue escapar e encontrar novos amigos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Faça um Desejo!, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Quatro crianças descobrem uma criatura mágica que concede desejos em uma viagem à praia. Elas só não imaginavam que o vizinho esquisitão da casa ao lado também está de olho nesses poderes. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alex Rider, adolescente britânico habilidoso em linguística, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, é recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira missão é investigar o bilionário Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doações de mega computadores às escolas da Inglaterra. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Big Stone Gap é o lar de personagens charmosos e excêntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacêutica de 35 anos, é a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabeça para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de família. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Deus Não Está Morto - Uma Luz na Escuridão, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um incêndio atinge a Igreja de Saint James, devastando a congregação e o Pastor Dave, e a universidade vizinha usa a tragédia para tentar despejar a congregação de seu campus. Dave recorre a seu irmão, um advogado ateu, para tentar reerguer a igreja. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Tommy e Rosie são um casal apaixonado, mas que acabam presos ao serem flagrados roubando. Após esse deslize, eles tentam ganhar a vida honestamente, mas logo ele se vê envolvido no julgamento de um famoso assassino da máfia. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden the Movie: Bonds

programme.desc: 2007. Seus inimigos derrotados, kisame e itachi, parecem ter sido clones, cujos poderes e aparecimento foram copiados por um jutsu de personificação. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Morte Do Gaara - T01E17
programme.desc: 2007. As equipes kakashi e guy fazem uma pausa.vovó chiyo observa naruto cochilar e lembra de sasori quando criança. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Postura Tática: Operação Entrada Em Gancho! - T01E18
programme.sub-title: Postura Tática: Operação Entrada Em Gancho!
programme.desc: 2007. As equipe kakashi e guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki. Eles correm para se infiltrar mas são parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. O único jeito de quebrar a barreira éremovendo os cinco selos de uma só vez. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy! - T01E19
programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!
programme.desc: 2007. Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cópias idênticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi! - T01E20
programme.desc: 2007. Finalmente a luta entre avó e neto começa. Sakura fica confusa com a aparência estranha de sasori, e vovó chiyo explica que aquele é hiruko, o corpo que sasori usa para autodefesa. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori - T01E21
programme.desc: 2007. Vovóchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente não envelheceu nada nos últimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo - T01E22
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura é pega pelas táticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaçavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para forçá-lo a dar informações sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Mãe - T01E23
programme.desc: 2007. A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos é que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magnético. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage - T01E24
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma força sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um médico ninja é se evadir um ataque. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Três Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte - T01E25
programme.sub-title: Três Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura destrói o boneco do terceiro kazekage graças a um antídoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vovó chiyo que esse antídoto converte o veneno em proteína e funciona durante mais ou menos três minutos. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem! - T01E26
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura e vovó chiyo estão enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossível - T01E27
programme.desc: 2007. Embora tenha sido envenenada, vovó chiyo usa o últimoantídoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vovó chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim à vida de vovó chiyo. Mas vovó chiyo revida e derrota sasori. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado - T01E29
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vovó chiyo, que está sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Estética De Um Momento - T01E30

Um Naruto mais velho chega à aldeia após uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki está de volta! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado - T01E31
programme.desc: 2007. Jiraiya traz notícias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ação. Naruto e Sakura propõem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivência. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara é o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage - T01E32
programme.desc: 2007. As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura forçam Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lança um jutsu após outro. Sakura usa técnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki começa uma operação secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo - T01E33
programme.desc: 2007. Gaara percebe a presença de Deidara e começa uma batalha aérea na areia. O jonin da areia é Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrível poder de Kakashi. A dupla dá seu golpe final. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formação! A Nova Equipe Kakashi - T01E34
programme.desc: 2007. Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de três liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora são todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adição Indesejada - T01E35
programme.desc: 2007. Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia é salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnerável. As tentativas de seus companheiros são inúteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mãos de Deidara. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso - T01E36

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Título - T01E37
programme.desc: 2007. Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como também hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara está sofrendo. Kankuro é infectado por um veneno. Sem um antídoto, ele terá poucos dias de vida. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulação - T01E38

Kankuro começa a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as táticas dos bonecos não funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas táticas. programme.desc: 2007. Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vovó Chiyo, perita em veneno, é chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara começam o jutsu de selamento e os nove dragões fantasmas. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta - T01E40
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mãos firmes. Vovó Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua própria aprendiz e pela determinação de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informações sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um cão de caça ninja. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Missão Super Secreta Se Inicia - T01E41
programme.sub-title: A Missão Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: 2007. Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vovó Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a história das bestas de cauda. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki - T01E42
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe começam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lança um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lágrimas De Sakura - T01E43
programme.desc: 2008. Guy se arrepende ao ver seus três alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxigênio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha - T01E44
programme.desc: 2008. Vovó Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi começa um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequências Da Traição - T01E45
programme.desc: 2008. Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificação. Vovó Chiyo explica a conexão entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lágrimas escorrem em seu rosto. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Página Inacabada - T01E46

Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma visão chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laços - T01E48

Forçado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vovó Chiyo e Sakura não façam nada precipitado. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante... - T01E49
programme.desc: 2008. A luta entre avó e neto começa. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destruído primeiro. Só a própria avó consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas é Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratégia usarão? programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A História Do Álbum Ilustrado - T01E50
programme.desc: 2008. Chiyo e Sakura expõem Sasori, que não envelheceu nada nos últimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local. programme.desc: 2008. Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaça. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para forçá-lo a dar informações sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha - T01E52

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Título - T01E53

Sasori usa seu último trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contorção - T02E56

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato - T02E61

programme.desc: 2008. Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontrarão de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto não deve ser enviado em missões envolvendo a Akatsuki. programme.title: Discarded Things
programme.desc: An esteemed music professor is thrown out of her lavish academic world and into the harsh reality of teaching at-risk youth.

programme.title: Be the Light
programme.desc: Hoping to reconnect with her terminally ill, estranged father, a talented singer-songwriter decides to enter a music competition to raise money for his cancer treatments.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: Freedom to Leave the House! Inogen Portable Oxygen
programme.desc: Regain independence and enjoy greater mobility with the compact design and long-lasting battery of portable oxygen.

programme.title: Pain Relief Revealed
programme.desc: Discover the hidden story of OmegaXL with John Walsh. He dives deep into the groundbreaking supplement that promises hope and relief for millions battling joint pain and inflammation.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn whats behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQs Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: Pain Relief Revealed
programme.desc: Discover the hidden story of OmegaXL with John Walsh. He dives deep into the groundbreaking supplement that promises hope and relief for millions battling joint pain and inflammation.

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Its in the Family
programme.desc: Exploring family relationships, both the loving and the difficult.

programme.title: 6 Minutes to Glory: The HBCU Band Experience - Jackson State University
programme.desc: The Jackson State University band, the Sonic Boom of the South; band directors discuss a paramilitary structure within HBCU bands; the leaders of the Jackson 5 Drum Major Squad and the Prancing J-Settes dance line.

programme.title: 6 Minutes to Glory: The HBCU Band Experience - Alcorn State University
programme.desc: A tribute to the distinctive and fascinating culture of Black marching bands - The Halftime Show.

programme.title: 6 Minutes to Glory: The HBCU Band Experience - Grambling State University
programme.desc: A tribute to the distinctive and fascinating culture of Black marching bands - The Halftime Show.

programme.title: 6 Minutes to Glory: The HBCU Band Experience - Prairie View AAndM University
programme.desc: A tribute to the distinctive and fascinating culture of Black marching bands - The Halftime Show.

programme.title: Love Me or Leave Me
programme.desc: A reckless teenager ditches her infant twins and scoots off to someplace, only to return into their lives years later when they have grown up into adults with issues.

programme.title: Shes Not Our Sister
programme.desc: After three sisters bury their father, family secrets are revealed that will alter their lives forever. But things really take a turn when a will is discovered that reveals that things are not as black and white as they thought them to be.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Fighting Kyles
programme.desc: Michael and Jay give their bickering kids a taste of their own medicine, making them scared theyre on the brink of breaking up.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Sister Story
programme.desc: Michaels sister (Vivica A. Fox) visits and sparks a rivalry with Jay.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Jr.s Dating Dilemma
programme.desc: Michaels advice about women backfires when Jr. ends up with two dates to a dance; Jay dreams Michael is having an affair with Janet Jackson.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Jay the Artist
programme.desc: When Michael inspires Jays artistic side, she makes him pose for a nude painting that makes him the subject of everyones jokes.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Chair Man of the Board
programme.desc: Michael is caught by surprise when his childhood friend, Tommy, shows up for a visit in a wheelchair.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Open Your Heart
programme.desc: Jay insists that Michael attend a couples seminar with her; Jr. and his friends try to make some extra money.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Michaels Tribe
programme.desc: Michael volunteers to be chief for Kadys Indian Princess sleepover and tries to keep Claire from sneaking out to a rave with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Mann And Wife - Undercover Mann
programme.desc: Daniel and Michael go under cover to catch an art thief; Michelle visits and is excited to help DJ with a school assignment.

programme.title: Mann And Wife - Mann Up
programme.desc: Tonis cousin comes to visit after another break up but Lorraine sets her straight; DJ and Trey try to prove their masculinity by participating in a police ride along; Daniel and Michael fight for the Lieutenants job.

programme.title: Mann And Wife - Miracle Mann
programme.desc: Tasha thinks she has healing powers when her goldfish dies and comes back to life; Michaels father comes to visit.

programme.title: Mann And Wife - Empire State of Mann
programme.desc: Michael Hobbs falls in love with a woman and wants to move back to New York City with her; Terri doesnt feel that college is necessary to be successful.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Big Daddy Meets the Man of Steele
programme.desc: When an ex-boyfriend of Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) comes into town, Steve (Steve Harvey) gets a date to make Regina jealous. Guest star: Adele Givens.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Shut Up and Kiss Me
programme.desc: Romeo uses romance to keep a gifted singer from upstaging his act with Bullethead in the school talent contest.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Youre Driving Me Crazy
programme.desc: Regina and Warringtons (Wendy Raquel Robinson, guest star Dorien Wilson) spat leaves Steve and Cedric (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer) out in the cold.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Dancing Fools
programme.desc: Regina and Cedric (Wendy Raquel Robinson, Cedric The Entertainer) battle Lovita and Steve (Terri J. Vaughn, Steve Harvey) in a dance competition; Romeo (Merlin Santana) tries to get good grades.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Breakfast With Tiffany
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) is recruited to help raise the spirits of Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) newly separated friend Tiffany (guest star Jackie Mari Roberts).

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Getaway
programme.desc: The family goes to San Diego for a relaxing vacation; Bernie, unable to relax, goes to Las Vegas for some gambling and debauchery.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Easy Rider
programme.desc: A motorcycle accident changes Bernies perspective about protecting the kids; Jordan is caught trying to sell Bernies girlie magazines to other boys at school.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Whos That Lady?
